text: Elizabeth G. Volkonskaya Elizabeth Volkonskaia (1838-1897) was a Russian noble and courtier. She played a leading role within the Catholic movement in Russia and has been referred to as the first woman in Russia to conduct serious historical theological studies.«Волконская Елизавета Григорьевна» //Католическая энциклопедия. Т. 1. М.:2002, ст. 1068—1069 Her children were Sergei Mikhailovitch Volkonsky, Peter Volkonsky, Alexandr Volkonsky and Vladimir Volkonsky. == References == Category:1838 births Category:1897 deaths Category:19th-century Russian people Category:Russian ladies-in-waiting Category:Russian Eastern Catholics
title: Elizabeth G. Volkonskaia
